price: Na εbεka wo Wura Nyankopͻn Kεseε Onimuonyamfoͻ no animuonyam nko ara.
arabic: وَيَبۡقَىٰ وَجۡهُ رَبِّكَ ذُو ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wayabqā wajhu rabbika dhū al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
